ygData.subject: Question about Plat Guides.
ygData.msgSnippet: I do not want to pay for Plat Guides... I like playing the Game too much.  However I wish I knew how to lvl faster and get Plat faster since I can not play but
ygData.messageBody:
I do not want to pay for Plat Guides... I like playing the Game too
much. However I wish I knew how to lvl faster and get Plat faster
since I can not play but about 1 time a week.

I heard these guides do not tell you much. However I have learned
how to use the Deathfist Belts to lvl up a new character real fast
found in EC. What else do I not know? Is there a website that can
teach me some of the secrets?

Thanks,
ColdMerlin Lvl 13 Wiz/Hum
